channel.title: L33T Java Programmers Needed. Java job
channel.description:
Basically its an online Debating system. You see them, you hear them. People connect via Applet and watch. If it gets finished in 5 weeks. You get an [b]extra[/b] 500$. The amount given per person depends on how many do it. ie, one person does it, they get the entire amount up for grabs, 4 people and its split. For more information, contact. zapzappy@hotmail.com. More details :
Video Debating System//// I haven't thought of a name yet, we'll just call it VDS for now. ____________________ Main Idea: 2 "LIVE" Videos in 1 browser. A video for each of the two debaters, side by side. ____________________ The Audience: Watch the two debaters debate, they post their thoughts in the comment section, vote for the winner, or respond with a video. (like YouTube, I know...) ____________________ Profiles: Members have profiles, include the following: Their debate record (wins-losses & percentage) Other site statistics Full name * E-Mail * Home Page * Occupation * Age * * = Optional ___________________ Debatable Topics: Politics and Economics Culture and Religions Law and Crime Health and Education Sports Global Affairs Science and Technology Governance Rap Battles Other (Must give description of subject, and approved by admins) ___________________ Extras: If possible, we'll have a page for just 'Audio' Debates, with a MIC (For those without a webcam). -------------------- For those who can't or don't want to go 'LIVE' for whatever reason, can record and submit their Video/Audio file, and once their opponent submits theirs, the debate is automatically posted. -------------------- Member Reputation System: out of 5 stars, it's based on the amount of debates, comments, winning/losing percentage,etc... -------------------- Members are able to simply click a "Challenge" button in the members profile. Once clicked a form must be filled out as follows: Topic: (Drop Down Menu with Options) Live: (Yes or No) Date & Time: (Only if it's Live) Device: (Webcam or Mic) Comments: (Optional) Once finished, the invitation is sent to that member, (must accept in less than 7 days). -------------------- Members can send personal messages to eachother. ------------------- __________________ Navigation: Home Live Debates--> Video,Audio-->Topics Inactive Debates--> Video,Audio-->Topics Scheduled Debates Archived Debates Categories ...something like that __________________

item.title: L33T Java Programmers Needed. Java job
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

you want video for debating because it works on the debator’s moral whenever they see the opponant recoil at their counter-point.

Read full topic

item.title: L33T Java Programmers Needed. Java job
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:22000”][quote author=White Castle link=topic=32841.msg398097#msg398097 date=1162643720]
Umm, you want input from webcam with Java? I guess I’ll give it a shot.

Shit, this is easy with JMF. I’ll have to figure out some way to remotely load JMF so the ppls don’t don’t have to install it. Shet it’s 3:50… lels.
[/quote]
you can put the jar on the web, and archive=jmf.jar leol[/quote]

JMF is wierd with getting audio and video devices unless you install it, for some reason.

Read full topic

item.title: L33T Java Programmers Needed. Java job
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

Basically its an online Debating system. You see them, you hear them. People connect via Applet and watch.

If it gets finished in 5 weeks. You get an extra 500$.

The amount given per person depends on how many do it. ie, one person does it, they get the entire amount
up for grabs, 4 people and its split.

For more information, contact. zapzappy@hotmail.com.

More details :

Video Debating System////

I haven’t thought of a name yet, we’ll just call it VDS for now.

Main Idea:

2 “LIVE” Videos in 1 browser. A video for each of the two debaters, side by side.

The Audience:

Watch the two debaters debate, they post their thoughts in the comment section, vote for the winner, or respond with a video. (like YouTube, I know…)

Profiles:

Members have profiles, include the following:

Their debate record (wins-losses & percentage)
Other site statistics
Full name *
E-Mail *
Home Page *
Occupation *
Age *

  • = Optional

Debatable Topics:

Politics and Economics
Culture and Religions
Law and Crime
Health and Education
Sports
Global Affairs
Science and Technology
Governance
Rap Battles
Other (Must give description of subject, and approved by admins)

Extras:

If possible, we’ll have a page for just ‘Audio’ Debates, with a MIC (For those without a webcam).

For those who can’t or don’t want to go ‘LIVE’ for whatever reason, can record and submit their Video/Audio file, and once their opponent submits theirs, the debate is automatically posted.

Member Reputation System: out of 5 stars, it’s based on the amount of debates, comments, winning/losing percentage,etc…

Members are able to simply click a “Challenge” button in the members profile. Once clicked a form must be filled out as follows:

Topic: (Drop Down Menu with Options)

Live: (Yes or No)

Date & Time: (Only if it’s Live)

Device: (Webcam or Mic)

Comments: (Optional)

Once finished, the invitation is sent to that member, (must accept in less than 7 days).

Members can send personal messages to eachother.

Navigation:

Home
Live Debates–> Video,Audio–>Topics
Inactive Debates–> Video,Audio–>Topics
Scheduled Debates
Archived Debates
Categories

…something like that

__________________

Read full topic
item.source: L33T Java Programmers Needed. Java job
